description: A small battery component with a very high energy density.
A capacitor made from exotic compounds, capable of storing a high amount of electric charge.
Ultracapacitors assembled into a finely tuned energy storage array.
Superconductive wire warped upon itself manipulates the electromagnetic spectrum to store vast amounts of power.
A complex grid pins space-time to the surface of the multiversal hyper-torus, allowing the energies within to leak into our sliver of existence.
